bioAsHtml: François Le Droff is a software engineer at Adobe Systems. Prior to joining the Adobe, François spent a decade building various enterprise webN+1.0 applications for Schlumberger and Atos Open Source Center. François is a full-fledged geek, passionate about IT, Open Source software, and knowledge sharing.

acceptedTalks.title: La Barbe dans le cambouis : Sécurisons une bonne vieille application Java "Entreprise"

bio: François Le Droff is a software engineer at Adobe Systems. Prior to joining the Adobe, François spent a decade building various enterprise webN+1.0 applications for Schlumberger and Atos Open Source Center. François is a full-fledged geek, passionate about IT, Open Source software, and knowledge sharing.
